attributes.action: Obtain and register DNA of all New Born Babies to enable Police track down criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will not infringe on our human rights It will protect the innocent. Our personal details are accessible to the Police so DNA would complete the informtion they already have. It would be cost effective in the long turm as less time and man power would be used to track down the villain. It could save even more lives when it comes to serial killers, 'the police would know who they were looking for'. Lets get law and order in our country and live peaceful lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
